title: 請兼職 返19/6 - 10/7 人工六千

replies.msg:
臨時要搵人幫手做research 係趕左啲 唔好意思

煩請聯絡我tg: @Ptjobenquiry

Looking for 5 helpers for coming 3 weeks to work on outdoor projects.

Details:
Requirements: undergraduate or DSE student
Working period: 19/6 - 10/7. 15 working days
Starting from 19/6, 3 consecutive weeks outdoor research project
Will pay 6000 plus 600 bonus for those who can meet the operation KPIs.

Mostly business areas and some residential areas. A few in remote areas such as yuen long, tai po.

2-3 hrs project briefing and training will be provided on 19 Jun morning.
